title: subarrays
text:
Given an array and an integer k, find the maximum for each and every contiguous subarray of size k.Inputthe number n denoting number of elements in the array then after a new line we have the numbers of the array and then k in a new linen < 106k < 1051 ≤ k ≤ nand each element of the array is between 0 and 106(Edited:In fact, n ≤ 105)Outputprint the output arrayExampleInput:9
1 2 3 1 4 5 2 3 6
3Output:3 3 4 5 5 5 6
